name: Saint Rosward
text: On Play: You may trash 1 card from your hand: If the only Characters on your field are (Celestial Dragons) type Characters, K.O. up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 3 or less.

effect.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand: If the only Characters on your field are (Celestial Dragons) type Characters, K.O. up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 3 or less.
